newsitem.title: USA: BW/IP, Durco nears merger completion.
newsitem.headline: BW/IP, Durco nears merger completion.

text.p: BW/IP Inc and Durco International Inc said Wednesday that the waiting period under the provisions of the Hart-Scott-Rodino Act has expired.
Completion of the merger remains subject to approval by the shareholders of BW/IP and Durco at simultaneous special shareholder meetings scheduled on July 22.
A joint proxy statement and prospectus will be mailed to shareholders of both companies beginning June 19.

Bernard Rethore, BW/IP's chairman and chief executive said, "We are very pleased to have cleared Justice Department review of the transaction and look forward to the upcoming shareholder vote. The combination of BW/IP and Durco will create a premier flow control company with over $1.1 billion in annual sales and the ability to compete on a global basis."
